skill.name: Death Hug
skill.value: Deals 3734/4454 DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a high/very high chance of inflicting Stun.

ability.name: Overflowing Poison (Lv. 52)
ability.value: Skill attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Poison.

ability.name: Poison Gas Aura (Lv. 78)
ability.value: Moderate chance of inflicting Poison on all foes at the start of each wave.
